images.title: Spotter Profile
images.desc: This is your customizable user profile with name, picture, status bar & other details. Your Spotter Self!

images.title: SpottCards
images.desc: Six ways to share an activity - images/videos/texts/web-links/voice-notes & Spotticons. Seventh being your own creativity!

images.title: SpottFeed
images.desc: Constant updates of all that brews in Spotter World, so that you never miss out on anything!

images.title: SpottNow
images.desc: Feeling Creative? Have an activity to share? That's when you SpottNow!

images.title: SpottBuddies
images.desc: Your trusted inner circle on Spotter, your friends & family. Those you donâ€™t mind welcoming, whose attention you like.

images.title: Trail
images.desc: Traveling somewhere? Why not document your trip? Make a trail of memories, a trail of SpottCards! Your trip log for future reference!

images.title: Nearby
images.desc: A feature to view SpottCards created in close proximity of your current location!

images.title: Spotts
images.desc: Your global footprints. A map-view of all your memories, your SpottCards created in different parts of the world.

images.title: Spottification
images.desc: Get a notification each time a Buddy directly shares something with you, or keep up with Buddies from another circle who show some love!
